channel.title: Need help with Repositioning redstones
channel.description:
So, pretty much i've removed my game frame, and every sprite loading thing I had, to make my client look like a 377. Anyways - The icons and red stones are fucked right up. Anyway so heres a picture, and I know it can be done because like tons of clients have it. Lol, if anyone can just like... give me a working method... Would be great. :woot:
[IMG]http://www.projectdiabolus.com/gameframe.gif[/img]
Thanks. And also don't post unless you think it's going to help. Any flame calling me a noob or saying for me to do it myself will just be ignored or reported. I obviously don't know how to do this myself, It's not due to me being lazy....

item.title: Need help with Repositioning redstones
item.dc:creator: @Diabolus Diabolus
item.description:
@Diabolus wrote:

Hmm. I’m not really too good at that whole cache editing thing. Like even with the suite and stuff, im just like horrible at it I’ll give it a shot though.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with Repositioning redstones
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

I don’t know how to in the client, but you change the offset x/y, and then rotation if I remember correctly. The easiest way to do it imo is via cache editing.

Read full topic
